Landscape design and irrigation systems

Professional services in design, landscaping, irrigation system installation and maintenance in Montenegro

What we do Our works About us

Design

The first step to a beautiful garden. Receive a complete set of drawings needed for your garden design implementation, from balconies to hectares.

Landscaping

Assistance with your garden’s greenery: from material selection to planting. Author's supervision is also possible.

Irrigation

An essential aspect of a blooming garden, making maintenance easy and convenient. We offer turnkey irrigation systems: from design to installation.

Our works

Landscaping projects

Irrigation systems

Landscape designs

Hi! We are Alexey and Svetlana Khazov, working in landscape design and automatic irrigation for over 20 years.

We have developed and implemented projects in various regions of Russia, as well as in Bulgaria, Greece, and Montenegro. Our experience and continuous training allow us to create garden designs that meet clients' wishes and harmonize with nature.
